languages.text:
This creature will explode on their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This creature's death will also cause an explosion.
The explosion has a 4-cell radius and deals <u>(from 24 to 39)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}impact damage{/g} with 10% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
This creature will explode on their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This creature's death will also cause an explosion.
The explosion has a 4-cell radius and deals <u>(from 24 to 39)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}explosive damage{/g} with 10% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.

This creature will explode on their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This creature's death will also cause an explosion.
The explosion has a 4-cell radius and deals <u>(from 24 to 39)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}impact damage{/g} with 10% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.

This creature will explode on their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This creature's death will also cause an explosion.
The explosion has a 4-cell radius and deals <u>(from 24 to 39)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}impact damage{/g} with 10% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.

languages.text:
此生物会在下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时爆炸。若此生物死亡，也会引发爆炸。
爆炸会对4格内所有生物造成<u>24-39</u>点{g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}冲击伤害{/g}，此次爆炸拥有10%的{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}。
languages.original_text:
This creature will explode on their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This creature's death will also cause an explosion.
The explosion has a 4-cell radius and deals <u>(from 24 to 39)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}impact damage{/g} with 10% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
此生物会在下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时爆炸。若此生物死亡，也会引发爆炸。
爆炸会对4格内所有生物造成<u>24-39</u>点{g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}冲击伤害{/g}，此次爆炸拥有10%的{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}。

languages.text:
В свой следующий {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} существо взорвется. Если убить существо раньше, также произойдет взрыв.
Взрыв имеет радиус в 4 клетки и наносит <u>(от 24 до 39)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}ударного урона{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Пробитие брони{/g} составляет 10%.
languages.original_text:
This creature will explode on their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This creature's death will also cause an explosion.
The explosion has a 4-cell radius and deals <u>(from 24 to 39)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}explosive damage{/g} with 10% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.

traits.locale_text: В свой следующий {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} существо взорвется. Если убить существо раньше, также произойдет взрыв.
В свой следующий {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} существо взорвется. Если убить существо раньше, также произойдет взрыв.

languages.text:
この生物は次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}で爆発する。この生物が死ぬと爆発が起こる。
この爆発は、4セル範囲内に<u>（24～39）</u>の{g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}衝撃ダメージ{/g}を与える。この攻撃の{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}は10%。
languages.original_text:
This creature will explode on their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This creature's death will also cause an explosion.
The explosion has a 4-cell radius and deals <u>(from 24 to 39)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}impact damage{/g} with 10% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
この生物は次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}で爆発する。この生物が死ぬと爆発が起こる。
この爆発は、4セル範囲内に<u>（24～39）</u>の{g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}衝撃ダメージ{/g}を与える。この攻撃の{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}は10%。

languages.text:
Esta criatura explotará en su siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. Matar a la criatura solo adelantará la explosión.
La explosión tiene un radio de 4 casillas e inflige <u>(de 24 a 39)</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}daño de impacto{/g} con 10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g}.
languages.original_text:
This creature will explode on their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This creature's death will also cause an explosion.
The explosion has a 4-cell radius and deals <u>(from 24 to 39)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}impact damage{/g} with 10% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Esta criatura explotará en su siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. Matar a la criatura solo adelantará la explosión.

languages.text:
Diese Kreatur explodiert bei ihrem nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g}. Der Tod dieser Kreatur führt ebenfalls zur Explosion.
Die Explosion wirkt in einem Radius von 4 Feldern und verursacht <u>(24 bis 39)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}Aufprallschaden{/g} mit 10 % {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g}.
languages.original_text:
This creature will explode on their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This creature's death will also cause an explosion.
The explosion has a 4-cell radius and deals <u>(from 24 to 39)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}impact damage{/g} with 10% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Diese Kreatur explodiert bei ihrem nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g}. Der Tod dieser Kreatur führt ebenfalls zur Explosion.

languages.text:
Cette créature explose lors de son prochain {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}. Sa mort provoque également une explosion.
L'explosion a un rayon de 4 cases et inflige <u>(de 24 à 39)</u> points de {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}dégâts d'impact{/g} avec 10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g}.
languages.original_text:
This creature will explode on their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This creature's death will also cause an explosion.
The explosion has a 4-cell radius and deals <u>(from 24 to 39)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}impact damage{/g} with 10% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cette créature explose lors de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant. Sa mort provoque également une explosion.
